Row.Cell: Shit! This is the wrong way!
Damn it! Not this way! Where the hell have I gone now?!
Põrgu! Mitte siia! Kus kurat ma nüüd olen?!
I'm finished! Serves me right for not paying attention!
Olen läbi! Teenisin ära halva tähele panemise eest!
Now what do I do with you, you miserable bugger?
Nüüd mida ma sinuga teen, õnnetu pede?
Maybe next time you'll think twice about breaking the law!
Äkki järgmine kord s amõtled kaks korda enne, kui rikud seadust!
Oh, dear Lord, please let him be safe.
Oh, armas jumal, palun kaitse teda.
I'm over here! What the hell's going on?!
Ma olen siin! Mis türa toimub?
For the love of God let me out!
Jumala armastuse nimel, laske mind välja!
I don't want to talk about that.
To the right is the road to the mines, a dead end. That's no use - I have to go straight for Talmberg!
Paremale viib tee kaevandusse ehk tupikusse. See ei sobi - Pean minema otse Talmbergi!
Left! Talmberg is to the left along the stream!
Vasakule! Talmberg jääb vasakule ojast edasi!
Quickly everyone! Get your arses here!
Ruttu kõik! Tooge oma persed siia!
And bring hot wine and bandages.
Ja tooge kuuma veini ja sidemeid!
Tell me, boy, who are you and where are you from?
Ütle mulle, poiss, kes sa oled ja kust pärined?
They burned it to the ground - slaughtered everyone.
Nad põletasid selle maha - tapsid kõiki.
I've never seen armour like it, or heard their language…
Ma pole sellist rüüd näinud ega kuulnud nende keelt.
and they weren't Czechs, or Germans either.
Ja nad polnud tšehlased ega sakslased.
Who? Who burned it to the ground?
A huge army. They attacked without warning…
Well, we'll deal with that later.
First let's have a look at that leg of yours.
I'm going to pull that arrow out.
You were lucky, lad - the arrow missed the bone.
Sul vedas, poisike - nool ei jõudnud luuni.
It only needed bandaging, and I've done that often enough before. War is a good teacher.
Oli vaja vaid kinni siduda, ja seda olen ma piisavalt teinud. Sõda on hea õpetaja.
There you go, good as new! Aah!
You'll have to speak to Lord Divish. Can you manage?
Sa pead Lord Divishiga rääkima. Saad hakkama?
Have you idlers nothing better to do? Get back to work!
Kas teil, laiskvorstidel, pole paremat teha? Tagasi tööle!
Sir, this is a survivor from the….
Tell me, boy, what exactly happened?
Ütle mulle, poiss, mis täpselt juhtus?
Did you see the ensigns of the attackers? And were there any more survivors?
Kas sa nägid ründajate lippe? Ja kas on veel ellujäänuid?
They burned Skalitz to the ground but a lot of people took refuge in the castle.
Nad tegid Skalitzi maatasa, aga paljud varjasid end lossis.
The ones who did the slaughtering spoke a… a strange language.
Need kes tapsid rääkisid… võõrast keelt.
And as I fled, they shouted from the battlements that I should come and warn you.
Ja kui ma jooksin, karjusid nad kaitsevallidest, et ma teid hoiataks.
Sir, I don’t know what army it was, but it was huge - there were dozens of banners flying on the hill above Skalitz.
Söör, ma ei tea, kelle armee see oli, aga see oli suur - tosin lippu lehvis Skalitzi ees.
The soldiers the boy didn't recognise, they could be those Cumans of Sigismund's.
Sõdurid, keda poiss ära ei tundnud, võisid olla need Sigismundi tatarlased.
It's said they came to Hungary from the East and now they're the core of his army.
Öeldakse, et nad tulid Ungarisse Idast ja nendest sai tema armee tuum.
Sacking Kuttenberg must have given him a taste for stolen silver...
Kuttenbergi vallandamise järel tundis ta varastatud hõbeda maitset…
Did Matthew and Fritz come looking for me?
Kas Mattias ja Frits on tulnud mind otsima?
No, I haven't seen them this morning.
Ei, ma ei ole näinud neid täna hommikul.
They shouldn't be hard to find. They'll be hanging around a tavern somewhere as usual.
Neid ei tohiks olla raske leida. Nad arvatavasti logelevad kõrtsis nagu alati.
Kas mu sõbrad on siin olnud?
Can I get something to eat?
I left some breakfast on the table. Help yourself.
Ma jätsin hommikusöögi lauale. Võta ise.
Is Father angry with me for sleeping late?
Kas isa on minu peale pahane pika magamise tõttu?
I know. Don't worry, Ma. Of course I'll help him.
Ma tean. Ära muretse, Emm. Loomulikult ma aitan teda.
He's not happy. Yesterday you promised him you'd help finish that sword for Sir Radzig.
Ta ei ole rõõmus. Eile sa lubasid talle, et sa aitad tal lõpetada selle Söör Radzigu mõõga.
He always says his knees ache when there's a storm coming. I hope they're wrong this time - it's looking like such a nice day.
Ta alati ütleb, et tema põlved valutavad enne tormi tulekut. Ma loodan, et nad seekord ei eksivad - päev tundub olevat nii kena.
He's not as young as he was and you know how his joints pain him. He's too proud to complain, but he needs your help, Henry.
Ta ei ole nii noor, nagu ta kunagi oli ning sa tead, et tema kondid annavad tunda. Ta on liiga suursugune, et kurta, kuid ta vajab sinu abi, Henri.
Do you need me to do anything, Ma?
Kas sul oleks millegagi vaja abi, Emm?
Ah, you're a good lad. But I'm fine - it's your father needs helping with that sword.
Oh, sa oled tore poiss, kuid minuga on kõik korras. Sinu isa vajab su abi selle mõõgaga.
Kas taat on minu peale pahane?
You're nearly a grown man, Hal. Father will pass the forge on to you one day soon, you've been courting that Bianca for months now…
Sa oled peaaegu täiskasvanu, poiss. Isa pärandab sulle ühel päeval sepikoja, sa oled kosinud seda Biankat juba kuid...
Why do you have to keep wasting your time with those two layabouts? They're nothing but trouble.
Miks sa pead enda aega raiskama nende loodritega? Nad pole muud kui häda.
Of course he is. He thinks he'll be able to wheedle the secret of beer-brewing out of her!
Loomulikult ta on. Ta arvab, et saab temast õlle pruulimise saladuse välja meelitada!
Really? So where were you until the small hours last night?
Tõesti? Nii et kus sa siis olid eilse öö viimaste tundideni?
I was... with Bianca, of course.
You're right there - you'd think he was planning to become a brewer in his dotage! Still, that's your father for you.
Sul on õigus sellega - võid arvata, et ta tahab pensionil õlu pruulida! Siiski, see on sinu isa.
You mean at Bianca's tavern. And who was there with you? No, don't tell me, let me guess - Matthew and Fritz!
Sa pead silmas Bianka kõrtsi. Ja kes oli seal sinuga? Ei, ära ütle mulle, lase mul arvata - Mattias ja Frits!
Well, at least you were with Bianca. You should hold onto that one, Hal. She's a clever girl. And invite her for supper some time. Your father's very fond of her.
Olgu, vähemalt sa olid Biankaga. Sa peaksid temast kinni hoidma, poiss. Ta on nutikas tüdruk. Ja kutsu ta lõunasöögile mõni kord. Sinu isa on temasse väga kiindunud.

At least he's interested in something, unlike you lot. You're too busy getting into mischief to do an honest day's work. If Fritz and Matthew carry on this way they'll wind up swinging one day, you mark my words.

Vähemalt ta on huvitatud millestki, mitte nagu sina. Sa oled ausa töö asemel liiga hõivatud koerustega. Kui Frits ja Mattias jätkavad sama teed, siis nad lõpetavad ühel päeval võllas, jäta mu sõnad meelde.
Mattias ja Frits ei ole joodikud!
I never said they were, did I? And if I really minded you going for a beer with them, I'd have put a stop to it long ago.
Ma pole seda öelnud, ega ju? Ja kui ma tõesti ei salliks sinu joominguid nendega, siis ma oleksin need ammu lõpetanud.
I was young once too, you know. And your father was no angel when he was in Kuttenberg...
Ma olin ka kunagi noor, tead eks? Ja su isa polnud samuti ingel, kui ta oli Kutna Horas...
Not this again! Leave it lie, Mother.
Mitte jälle! Jäta see juba lõpuks rahule, ema.
You don't believe me? Ask him yourself.
Sa ei usu? Küsi talt ise.
You're not a boy anymore, Henry. You're a man and it's time to start acting like one. Yesterday you promised your father you'd help at the forge.
Sa pole enam poisike, Henri. Sa oled mees ning sul on aeg käituda nagu üks. Eile sa lubasid ena isale, et sa aitad teda sepikojas.
If you made yourself useful now and then, I wouldn't mind your mischief-making so much.
Kui sa teeksid rohkem kasulikku, siis ma ei oleks sinu koerustele nii vastu.
I'm sure he'll be happy to hear it. Is that all?
Ma olen kindel ,et ta lõhken õnnest, kui seda kuuleb. Kas see on kõik?
You want me to go and pick it up? Alright. Money, charcoal, cross-guard - got it.
Sa tahad, et ma tooksin selle ka ära? Olgu. Raha, süsi, käepide - sain aru.
Not quite. The Chamberlain at the castle has the cross-guard for Sir Radzig's sword, which I had engraved in Sasau.
Mitte päris. Lossi majahärral on veel söör Radzigu mõõga käepide, mille ma lasin Sazavas graveerida.
Right. So make sure Bianca draws me a nice cool one. Run along now, work won't wait.
Täpselt. Nii et tee kindlaks, et Bianka tooks mull mõnusa külma õlle. Jookse nüüd, töö ei oota.
I'm running out of charcoal. Run to the market and buy a bag from the charcoal burner.
Mul ei ole piisavalt sütt. Mine turule ning osta üks kott söepõletajalt.
And ale! Stop off at the tavern on your way home - I know you'll be going there anyway to see that girl of yours. But make sure the ale's still cool from the cellar when you get back.
Ja õlu! Peatu tagasiteel kõrtsis. Ma tean, et sa lähed sinna niikuinii, et näha seda enda tüdrukut. Kuid veendu, et õlu oleks külm, kuni sa selle siia tood.

That's the other thing. Kunesh still owes me for an axe, a hammer and the nails I sold him a month ago, not to mention his debt from before. Go and tell him to pay up at least for the axe and hammer and then use the money to buy the charcoal.

See on teine asi. Kunesh võlgneb ikka veel mulle kirve, haamri ning naelte eest, mis ma talle kuu aega tagasi müüsin, jättes mainimata võla, mida ta enne seda võlgnes. Mine ja räägi temaga, et ta maksaks vähemalt kirve ja haamri eest ning seejärel ostad selle raha eest sütt.
Kunesh, that drunkard? That'll be fun…
Kunesh, see joodik? See saab olema põnev...
Anyway, we've a lot of work to do today. I'm finishing the sword for Sir Radzig and I need your help.
Igastahes, meil on täna vaja teha palju tööd. Ma lõpetan Söör Radzigi mõõka ning ma vajan su abi.
Well, you're a big lad now. I'm sure you can manage. If not, tell him that next time I'll come myself and personally use that hammer to bang those nails into his arse.
Jah, sa oled nüüd suur poiss. Ma olen kindel, et sa saad hakkama. Kui ei, siis ütle, et järgmisel korral ma tulen ise ning isiklikult kasutan seda haamrit, et need naelad tema perse lüüa.
Sorry, I had to go and deal with something.
Vabanda, kuid ma pidin minema ja ühe asja korda ajama.
Sorry, Father. I was taking a stroll and lost track of time. Somehow I had a feeling I was seeing everything for the first time.
Vabandust, isa. Ma jalutasin ning kuidagi kaotasin ajataju. Millegipärast oli mul tunne, et ma nägin seda kõike esimest korda.
Why should I jump whenever someone whistles? You should be glad I came at all.
Miks ma peaksin hüppama, kui keegi vilistab? Sa peaksid olema õnnelik, et ma üleüldse tulin.
What have you got to do that's so important? Chasing women? Acting the fool with Fritz? I don't even want to know.
Mida sul tähtsat teha on? Sebida naisi? Lollitada Fritsiga? Ma isegi ei taha teada.
What are you blabbering about? I worry about you sometimes, boy.
Mida sa latrad? Mõnikord ma muretsen sinu pärast,, poiss.
Hal, my boy! When are you going to get some sense?
Pagana pihta poiss! Millal sa ometi aru pähe saad?
You'd better change your tone, boy! Be glad I'm too busy right now, or I'd tan your hide so much you'd have to sleep standing for a month!
Pigem muuda enda tooni, poiss! Ole õnnelik, et ma hetkel liiga hõivatud olen, muidu sa saaksid sellised triibulised püksid, et peaksid kuu aega seistes magama.
Well, I suppose a boy needs to spread his wings. Just be careful I don't clip them for you.
Nojah, küllap sul on vaja nagu linnukesel maailma avastada. Lihtsalt vaata, et sa enda tiibu ei kaota.
It looks as if Satan himself came for him!
Tundub, et Saatan isiklikult tuli talle järgi!
He had it coming. It's a judgement on his evil ways.
See oli tulemas. See on nuhtlus tema kurjuste eest.
Move along, citizens, move along. There's nothing to see here!
Minge edasi, kodanikud, minge edasi. Siin pole miskit vaadata!
If that's what you call 'nothing to see', I'd like to know what 'something to see' looks like.
Kui sa selle kohta ,,ei miskit vaatamiseks'' ütled, tahaks ma teada, mis ,,miski vaatamiseks'' oleks'.
By the keys of St. Peter! This is all I need! We'll have to send word to Sir Hanush.
Püha Peetruse võtmete nimel! See on kõik, mida vajan! Me peame seda Söör Hanushile edastama.
He kept company with all sorts of vermin. He was always getting into some kind of trouble, punch-ups in the tavern and what have you.
Ta oli kaaslaseks igat sorti kaabakatele. Ta alati sattus mingisse pahandusse, kaklustesse kõrtsis ja mida iganes.
A poor crofter and a scoundrel. Can't say I'm too surprised what happened to him.
Vaene talunik ja varganägu. Ei ütleks, et mind üllatas see, mis temaga juhtus.
He got that from some villainy or brawl a long time ago.
Seda põhjustas mingi kaabaklus või lööming pikka aega tagasi.
Has he been up to anything suspicious lately?
Kas ta tegeles millegi kahtlasega viimati?
Hmm… I don't know. The last few days he didn't go anywhere. He was home the whole time. But he always kept everyone in the village at arm's length.
Hmm... Ma ei tea. Viimastel päevadel ta kuskil ei käinud. Ta oli kodus terve aeg. Aga ta alati hoidis külas kõiki käeulatuses.
Do you know about anything suspicious?
Did he have any kith or kin in the village?
Olid tal mingid sugulased siin külas?
None. A loner, he was. I don't know the last time I saw him with anyone.
Mitte kedagi. Üksik oli ta. Ei mäleta millal teda viimati kellegagi nägin
Do you happen to know where he was on the night of the Neuhof raid?
Ega sa ei juhuslikult ei tea, kus ta Neuhoffi rünnaku ööl oli?
I've no idea. He kept his distance from other folk, so you never knew if he was away or holed up at home.
Mul pole aimugi. Ta hoidis eemale muust rahvast, seetõttu sa kunagi ei tea, kas ta oli eemal või peitus kodus.
Where was he on the night Neuhof was raided?
Kus ta oli tol ööl, kui Neuhoffi rünnati?
When did you find the body? And did anyone see anything?
Millal te laiba leidsite? Ja kas keegi nägi midagi?
Just now and nobody saw or heard anything. I don't know how they could gut him like that without someone hearing him scream.
Just praegu ja keegi ei kuulnud ega näinud midagi. Ma ei tea, kuidas nad teda niimoodi rappisid ilma, et keegi kuuleks tema karjumist.
For a crofter he had an awful lot of money in a trunk at home.
Taluniku jaoks oli tal kohutavalt palju raha kodus kirstus.
See raha kuulub nüüd Söör Hanushile.
Really? How much? You know what, lad, best keep it just between the two of us. How about we...
Tõsiselt? Kui palju? Tead mis, poisike, jätame seda meie kahe vahele. Äkki me võiks...
For a crofter he had an awful lot of money.
Taluniku jaoks oli tal kohutavalt palju raha.
I found a sword hidden at his place.
Ma leidsin peidetud mõõga tema juures.
A sword? Hell, it looks like you were right. What would the likes of him want a sword for except some devilry?
Mõõga? Põrgu, tundub, et sul oli õigus. Milleks vajaks temataoline mõõka peale mingi kurjuse?
I found a sword at his house.
I found armour in his house, covered in blood.
Ma leidsin raudrüü tema majas, kaetud verega.
At least he never did that here.
Vähemalt ta kunagi ei teinud seda siin.
God preserve us! Everyone knows he was a violent oaf, but I never thought he'd stoop to murder.
Jumal hoidku meid! Kõik teavad, et ta oli vägivaldne loll, aga ma iialgi ei arvaks, et ta saab mõrvamisega hakkama.
I found bloody armour at his house.
Ma leidsin verise raudrüü tema majas.
The parish priest here in Uzhitz, he's a peculiar sort of cleric. I noticed he's quite handy with a sword.
Koguduse preester siin Uzhitzis, on erilist sorti vaimulik. Panin tähele, et ta on üsna osav mõõgaga.
I doubt he acquired those skills at the seminary…?
Ma kahtlen, et ta sai need oskused vaimulikul seminaril...?
He is indeed. He's as hard as nails. More than once he's intervened in a brawl in the tavern and sat everyone on their arses. He's not to be taken lightly.
Ta on, tõsimeeli. Ta on tugev kui raudnael. Sageli sekkub ta löömingusse kõrtsis ja paneb kõik perse peale istuma. Teda ei saa kergemeelselt võtta.
But I heard something happened and he was roving the world for a while. I don't know what he got up to, though.
Aga ma kuulsin, et miski juhtus ja ta rändas ilma peal mingit aega. Kuigi ma ei tea, millega ta hakkama sai.
He probably learned to fight at home before he went to university. That's how it goes with those aristocrats.
Ta arvatavasti õppis võitlema kodus enne ülikooli minemist. Niimoodi läheb nendel aristokraatidel.
You know how it goes. The nobles send their youngest sons to study for the priesthood, and our parish priest has blue blood in him.
Sa tead, kuidas see läheb. Aadlikud saadavad nooremaid poegi preesterkonda õppima, ja meie koguduse preestril on aadliku veri.
The Uzhitz priest is no ordinary cleric.
I'm looking for a fellow they call Reeky. Do you know him?
Otsin selli nimega Reeky. Tunnete teda?
I'm looking for a fellow called Reeky. Have you ever heard of him?
Otsin selli nimega Reeky. Olete temast midagi kuulnud?
Ah! You wouldn't happen to know where he is, would you?
Ah! Ega te juhuslikult ei tea, kus ta on?
Psht! Why wouldn't I? That's what they call my son, Hynek.
Psht! Kuidas mitte? Niimoodi kutsutakse mu poega, Hynekut.
I'm looking for your son. Any idea where he might be?
Otsin teie poega. Oskate öelda, kus ta olla võib?
I'd like to talk to you about your Hynek.
I'm very busy, so make it quick.
I hear your son has a poacher's hideout in the woods. I want to know where it is.
Kuulsin, et teie pojal on metsas salaküti peidupaik. Tahan teada, kus see on.
Can you not see I'm busy with Master Feyfar here? If it's charcoal you want, lad, go and talk to my helper.
Kas sa ei näe, et ma ajan juttu Meister Feyfariga? Kui sul on vaja sütt, siis mine ja räägi mu abilisega.
If it's charcoal you want, talk to my hired hand. I've no time now.
Kui sul on vaja sütt, siis mine räägi mu palgatud abilisega. Mul ei ole hetkel aega.
Shit! Well, allow me to introduce you to Limpy Lubosh - or all that's left of him.
Sitt! Hästi, luba mul sulle tutvustada Lonkavat Luboshi- või seda, mis temast alles on.
Sakra! Nothing's ever easy. I'll have to take a look around and ask a few more questions - if that's all right with you?
Sakra! Miski pole iial lihtne. Ma pean ringi vaatama ja küsima rohkem küsimusi - kui see teile sobib?
You can take this whole mess off my hands and welcome to it. I don't what else there is to find out, but look and ask all you like.
Sa võid võtta kogu selle koorma endale kandmiseks. Ma ei tea, mida siin lisaks uurida on, aga vaata ja küsi palju tahad.
Lord above, they did a hell of a job on him. It must have been agony. How come no one heard anything?
Taeva Isand, nad tegid põrgutööd temaga. See oli suur piin. Kuidas keegi midagi ei kuulnud?
What's this? It looks like someone hit him very hard on the head. Could they have bludgeoned him to death and THEN gutted him? That would explain why he didn't scream.
Mis see on? Tundub, nagu oleks teda raskelt pähe löödud. Kas nad võisid teda surmani peksta ja SIIS rappida? See seletaks, miks ta ei karjunud.
"JUDAS". Hmm, it looks like this is meant to be a warning. But for who? And why? Maybe the gang had a falling out. But a bandit who knows how to write isn't something you see every day.
'JUUDAS''. Hmm, see näib olevat hoiatus. Aga kellele? Ja miks? Võib-olla oli punt tülis. Aga röövlit, kes oskab kirjutada, ei näe iga päev.
An inscription in blood. It's a pity I don't know how to read. It looks like they wanted to give someone a warning, but who? And a bandit who knows how to write isn't something you see every day.
Verega kirjutatud kiri. Kahju, et ma lugeda ei oska. Tundub, et nad tahtsid kedagi hoiatada, aga keda? Röövlit, kes oskab kirjutada, ei näe iga päev.
Quite a pile of money. Where did he get that?
Suhteliselt suur hunnik raha. Kust ta sai seda?
A sword? What the hell does an Uzhitz crofter need a weapon for? And where did he get it?
Mõõk? Mida põrgut teeb Uzhitzi talunik relvaga? Ja kust ta selle sai?
Armour? Well, it seems Lubosh wasn't your everyday crofter. And judging by the bloodstains, it looks like he lived the way he died.
Raudrüü? Selge, tundub, et Lubosh polnud tavaline talunik. Ja vereplekke arvestades, näib, et ta elas samamoodi nagu suri.
I've come in the name of Sir Hanush of Leipa. I'm investigating the massacre in Neuhof and now a murder here as well. Can I ask you a few questions?
Ma tulin siia Leipa Söör Hanushi nimel. Ma uurin Neuhofi veresauna ja nüüd ka üht mõrva siin. Võin ma teile paar küsimust esitada?
Can you tell me anything about Lubosh?
Saad sa mulle midagi Luboshist rääkida?
I don't know nothing about it, but ask all you want.
Ma ei tea sellest midagi, aga küsi kõike, mida tahad.
Sir Hanush gives a job like that to a young fellow like you? Well, what do I care? Ask.
Söör Hanush annab sellist tööd sinusugusele poisikesele? Hea küll, mind ei huvita. Küsi.
That man Lubosh who was murdered, what was he like?
See mees Lubosh, keda tapeti, milline ta oli?
Have you noticed anything suspicious recently?
Olete tähele pannud midagi kahtlast viimati?
Do you know what Lubosh was doing the day Neuhof was raided?
Kas te teate, mida Lubosh tegi päeval, kui Neuhoffi rünnati?
Do you know anyone Lubosh used to spend time with, relatives or friends?
Tunnete kedagi, kellega Lubosh aega veetis, sugulasi või sõpru?
I didn't really know him. He kept to himself, even in the tavern.
Ma eriti ei tundnud teda. Ta oli omaette, isegi kõrtsis.
He was a strange one, always drinking, bad tempered. Lord knows how he made a living… Well, maybe now I've got an idea or two.
Ta oli imelik, jõi koguaeg, kunnatu. Jumal teab, mille kulul ta elas... Hea küll, äkki praegu on mul millestki aimu.
He was a drunk who was always looking for a fight. Nobody liked him much, but I wouldn't wish an end like that on any man…
Ta oli joodik, kes alati noris tüli. Ta ei meeldinud kellelegi, aga ma ei sooviks sellist surma mitte ühelegi mehele...
Who was this Lubosh who was murdered?
Kes oli see Lubosh, keda tapeti?
Well, now I think of it, I hadn't seen him around for a while. No idea where he was skulking.
Siiski, nüüd ma mõtlen sellele, et pole teda ammu näinud. Pole aimugi, kuhu ta hiilis.
I didn't see much of him lately, not even in the tavern. Not till yesterday in church, as it happens.

Chin up, lad - I might have a solution.

I'm sorry you see it that way, really sorry. You've no idea how wrong you are.

With such money, gained from the poor, they buy beautiful horses to ride and needless servants to pamper them. They gamble at dice and dress their whores in expensive furs.

Look to your consciences, you robbers of the poor, for you are seen by God and his people too!
Mõelge oma südametunnistusele, teie, vaeste rüüstajad, sest Jumal ja tema inimesed näevad kõike!

Keelepeks kahe preestri kohta sobib tänavu ka hästi. Ja lood päris elust, millel on hea moraal, on samuti populaarsed.
While Jesus Christ walked barefoot and had no place to lay his head!
Samal ajal käis Jeesus Kristus paljajalu ja ei leidnud kohta, kus puhata!
Especially if they're about fornication and similar scandalous vices.
Eriti kui nad räägivad hoorusest ja sarnastest skandaalsetest pahedest.
Just like a flock of hungry ravens, they settled on this land to devour every grain of gold and silver.

The preaching of Master Jan Hus about Mother Church.
Master Jan Husi jutlustus Püha Ema Kirikust.
They know no mercy. Their hearts are corrupted by longing for wealth, and they shamelessly profit from everything.
Nad ei halasta. Nende südamed on rikutud ihast rikkuse järele, nad teenivad häbitult kõige pealt.

Mida sa mõtled? Mu olukord on teistsugune! Hus jutlustab kirikuvürstide ja vaimulike vastu, kes varastavad vaestelt! Vaata mind - Olen kerge taskuga. Ma pole parem rahvast, kellele jutlustan.

What do the common folk think of it?
Unless they burn him at the stake first!
Juhul kui nad teda põlema ei pane!
What are folk saying about it?

So you won't help me out with that secret?
Sa siis ei aita mind selle saladusega?

Well, nothing to worry about then. Everyone knows the only one around here who can write is me.

You looking for a fight? Henry, back me up!
Sul hambaid palju suus? Henri, aita mind!
Come on then, Bailiff! You wanted a fight, so come and get it! Don't worry, I won't give you any trouble. We'll just have a bit of a punch-up!
Tule nüüd, külavanem! Sa tahtsid kakelda, siis tule ja saa! Ära muretse, ma ei pane hullu. Teeme kõigest ühe väikse rusikavõitluse!
They can say what they like - what do I care? What can they do to me?
Nad võivad öelda, mida tahavad - mis see mind huvitab? Mis nad mulle teevad?
Stop that nonsense, Godwin! Are you out of your mind? What will people say?
Lõpeta see jama, Godwin! Oled peast segi? Mida ütlevad inimesed selle peale?
So, my dears, wouldn't you like to have a little ring on the bell? No sooner said than done! Burp!
Nii, mu kallid, ega te ei sooviks veidi kella helistada? Teeme kohe ära! Burp!
I'd love to, and Henry too, I'm sure! Right, Henry?
Mina sooviks, ja Henri ka, olen kindel! Onju nii, Henri?

Here we are! Look at this beauty!

Henry, look, from what I remember, we might have overdone it a bit last night. And if the Bailiff or someone else complains about me, the Bishop is going to have my guts for garters. So I'd appreciate it if you'd stop gaping at me like a stuffed squirrel and start helping.

Herrgott! Work more with your wrist! You're holding it like a stick!

Footwork! I keep telling you. Don't be lazy - take another step into that slash!

Come on, put your back into it!
Ole nüüd, pane oma selg sellesse.

Yes, you're that boy Sir Radzig sent.

A good idea. Let’s start with the basics.

Where did you think you were going? Jesus!

Not the same as holding a hammer, is it, blacksmith?

Good day to you, blacksmith's boy. Try not to hurt yourself.

Come on, put some effort into it!

Come on now, don't give Sir Radzig a bad name.

Godwin ei nimeta mulle Luboshi semusid

Ma lähen meeleldi, kui paned Godwini mu kõrvale. Oleks väärt teda piinlemas näha!

And let me give you another piece of advice: don't go boozing with Godwin again!

See on hea nõu. Tänan teid, Söör!

Ma leidsin teda kiiresti, aga keegi jõudis temani enne mind ja naelutas teda seinale.
He won't be talking to anyone again but St Peter - or possibly Satan. He confessed to Father Godwin before he was killed, but the priest won't tell me anything.

Absolutely! I tried to get something out of him, but he wouldn't budge. But how can I find out the names of Limpy's accomplices now? I can't make any progress without them.
Just nii! Püüdsin temalt vastust saada, aga ta ignoreeris mind. Aga kuidas saan ma nüüd Luboshi kaasosaliste nimesid teada? Nendeta ei jõua ma edasi.
I'm at a loss with this investigation, Sir.
Ma ei saa selle uuringuga hakkama, Söör.

Aga nüüd, kui ma mõtlen, kui ta tõesti oli selline kaabakas, siis teda karistati millegi tõsise eest.
There could be a record about him in the Rattay Black Chronicle, maybe even alongside the names of his cronies. It has to be worth trying!
Temast võib olla ülestähendus Rattaje Mustas Kroonikas, äkki ka tema kaaslaste nimesid leiab sealt. See on väärt proovimist!

It's essential that I find out those names. Is there anything I can do to help you get back to work?

God stands at the head of the Church.

It is not Man, but God who is the ruler of the world.

It is the corruption of God's pastors here on Earth that has brought misfortune on our heads! Plague, Cumans, hunger and chaos…
Jumala pastorite korruptsioon siin ilmas on toonud meile ebaõnne! Katku, nälga, kaost…

It is the corruption of God's pastors here on Earth that has brought misfortune on our heads!
Jumala pastorite korruptsioon siin ilmas on toonud meile ebaõnne!

They show no mercy, their hearts are poisoned by covetousness. They trade everything, everything is for sale.

Talk about the sin of fornication.

He's talking about Godwin! For sure he's talking about him, the drunkard!
Ta räägib Godwinist! Raudselt räägib ta temast, sellest joodikust!

And such sins! Those who should lead with reason, who should shun debauchery and show the path of righteousness, which is the duty of all priests, instead they indulge in drunkenness and intoxication!

Ja sellised patud! Need, kes peavad juhtima põhjusega, need, kes peavad vältima liiderlikkust ja näitama teed õigluse suunas, mis on preestri ülesandeks, selle asemel nad aga mõnulevad end purju juues!
Let us remember the marriage at Cana, where Our Lord Jesus Christ himself feasted with the other guests and drank his fill. And when the wine was gone, he performed a miracle and created more!
Tuletame meelde Cana pulmasid, kus meie Lord Jesus Kristus isiklikult pidutses teiste külalistega ja jõi end täis. Ja kui vein otsa sai, tegi ta imet ja lõi seda juurde!
He, whose companions were poor travellers, simple folk, prostitutes and troublemakers, performed a miracle so the feast could continue.
Tema, kelle kaaslasteks olid vaesed rändajad, tavarahvas, hoorad ja tülitegijad, tegi imet, et pidu saaks jätkuda.
For there should be moderation in all things and it is not drinking itself that is sinful, but intemperance and beastly indulgence!
Sest kõike tuleb teha mõõdukalt, seega joomine ise pole patt, vaid selle kuritarvitamine ja metsik hooletus!
Now that's the kind of sermon I like to hear!
Just sellist jutlust meeldib mulle kuulata!
It is the custom of the gluttonous prelates and monks to preach against sin, but what do they know of us ordinary folk?
Apladel kirikuvürstidel ja munkadel on tavaks jutlustada pattude vastu, aga mida nad meist, tavarahvast, ikka teavad?
No, brothers and sisters, Jesus did not condemn alcohol. Drink to lighten the cross you bear in this vale of tears, but not with such abandon that you cannot keep holy the Sabbath.
Ei, vennad ja õed, Jeesus ei keelanud alkoholi. Jooge, et kergendada risti, mida kannate, aga ärge tehke seda sellise hooletusega, et teid keegi hiljem ära ei tunne.
Enough about sin, which the prelates are so fond of preaching about, and whose absolution they promise if you only pay enough coin to Mother Church.
Aitab pattudest, millest kirikuvürstidele nii palju jutlustada meeldib, ja mida nad maha pesta lubavad, kui Püha Ema Kirikule piisavalt münte anda.
Enough about sin, which the prelates are so fond of preaching about, and whose absolution they promise if you only pay enough coin to Mother Church.
Aitab pattudest, millest kirikuvürstidele nii palju jutlustada meeldib, ja mida nad maha pesta lubavad, kui Püha Ema Kirikule piisavalt münte anda.
And whose absolution they promise if you pay enough coin to Mother Church.
Ja mida nad maha pesta lubavad, kui Püha Ema Kirikule piisavalt münte anda.
Enough about sin, which the prelates are so fond of preaching about.
Aitab pattudest, millest kirikuvürstidele nii palju jutlustada meeldib.
And what about those bishops? They sin without remorse and with the money grasped from the poor for indulgences, they keep fine horses and hordes of servants to pamper them.
Ja mis piiskopitega toimub? Nad ei kahetsegi oma patte ning selle rahaga, mida nad vaestelt haaravad, muretsevad nad omale hobuseid ning palkavad teenreid, et end hellitada.
Look to your consciences, you robbers of the poor, for you are seen by God and his people too!
Mõelge oma südametunnistusele, teie, vaeste rüüstajad, sest Jumal ja tema inimesed näevad kõike!
They play dice and garb their mistresses in expensive furs, while Christ, the lamb of God, walked barefoot and had nowhere to lay his head.
Nad mängivad täringut, ostavad armukestele kalleid kasukaid, kuigi näiteks Jeesus Kristus käis paljajalu ega leidnudki kohta, kus magada.
We're fortunate to have our good Father Godwin! At least he's a fair and simple man!
Õnneks on meil meie hea Isa Godwin! Vähemalt on ta aus ja lihtne mees!
Down with the prelates! Away with them!
What if the Devil himself were to pay? Will the bishops tell us he too would ascend to Heaven?
Mis juhtuks, kui Pagan maksta sooviks? Ütleksid piiskopid siis meile, et ka tema satub Paradiisi?
And that is not right, because… because Christ preached poverty. And only poverty and temperance are true virtues.
Ja see pole õige, sest… sest Kristus jutlustas vaesusest. Ja ainult vaesus ja karskus on tõelised voorused!
And it was almost getting interesting…
Ja see oli peaaegu huvitavaks saamas…
Look at them! They booze like hypocrites and buy expensive jewels. They, servants of God!
Vaadake neid! Joovad nagu silmakirjatsejad ja ostavad kalleid ehteid. Nemad, Jumala teenrid!

A priest who fornicates and indulges in gluttony and intoxication is no priest at all! You would do better to be your own priests, each and every one of you, for you have no need for such Pharisees and hypocrites to attain salvation!

Preester, kes hoorab ja mõnuleb ahnuses pole õige preester! Te suudaksite paremad preestrid enda jaoks olla, igaüks teist, sest te ei vaja selliseid vagatsejaid ja silmakirjatsejaid, et lunastust saavutada!
Yes! Down with the hypocrites! Down with Godwin!
Heed my words then: the Church is corrupt and her servants seek their own gain more than the salvation of your souls.
Võtke kuulda: Kirik on korruptiivne ja tema teenrid otsivad pigem omale kasu , kui aitavad päästa teie hinge.
Aye! All honour to Godwin! Let him drink like one of us!
Aye! Au Godwinile! Laseme tal juua, nagu oleks ta üks meist!
God sees what is happening on Earth and He is filled with righteous wrath that those who should seek the salvation of souls instead seek Mammon and the idle comfort of lucrative posts.
Jumal näeb mis Maamunal toimub ning Ta on täis õiglustatud viha, kuna need, kes peavad hingedele päästeteed otsima, tegelevad ebaõiglase rikkuse ja tulukate ametikohtade mugavuse otsimisega.
Criticise the prelates, but stand up for Godwin.
Kritiseeri kirikuvürste, aga astu Godwini kaitseks välja.

Let each speak as much as he knows. And he who knows nothing, let him at least teach his neighbour one virtuous deed, by setting him good example and refraining from playing dice and from fornication.
Laske igaühel rääkida nii palju, kui oskab. Ja kes midagi ei tea, laske tal õpetada naabrile üht voorusliku tegu, et näitaks head eeskuju ja hoiaks teda eemale hasartmängudest ja hoorusest.
And that applies both to priests and to you, brothers and sisters.
Ja see käib nii preestri kui ka teie kohta, mu vennad ja õed.
I say to you, in the words of Jan Hus: He who knows much, let him speak much; he who knows little, let him speak little.
Ma tsiteerin teile Jan Husi sõnu: Tema, kes teab palju, laske tal palju rääkida; tema, kes teab vähe, laske tal vähe rääkida.
That is all I heard in Prague. Amen.
See on kõik, mida ma Prahas kuulsin. Amen.
Have you no shame, you pair of buffoons? I'll be writing to the bishop of this!
Teil häbi pole, teil kahel klounil? Ma kirjutan sellest piiskopile.
Can you believe such behaviour? For men of the cloth to get drunk as pigs in church.
Mõistate te sellist käitumist? Et vaimulikud mehed jooksid end täis nagu sead.
Find someone else to help you.
Leia kedagi teist, kes sind aitaks.

All what? All of you making a complete hash of my sermon? You were supposed to help, not get me into even more trouble. Now I'll have the bishop on my back and all the villagers. Just leave. I need to pull myself together.

Pärast mida? Pärast seda jama, mis sa kokku keerasid? Sa pidid mind aitama, selle asemel aga ajasid mulle veel rohkem jama kaela. Nüüd on piiskop ja kogu rahvas mu kannul. Lihtsalt lahku. Ma pean ennast kokku võtma.
So is our deal still on?
You can't be serious! After all that…
Sa ei mõtle seda tõsiselt! Pärast kõike…
And what am I supposed to do?
Yeah, I noticed. And I wasn't the only one.
Panin tähele, jah. Ja ma polnud ainus.
Are you pulling my fucking pizzle? I couldn't have done worse myself if I'd puked on the altar!
Kuradi munnist tõmbad mind või? Ma ei suudaks halvemini teha isegi kui altarile ropsiksin.
He and his gang didn't want any part of that, so they quarrelled with the others and ran off.
Tema koos oma salgaga ei tahtnud sellest osa võtta, mille tõttu nad tülitsesid ja minema jooksid.
He said some crony of theirs hired them. First they thought they were going to steal horses, but then it all got out of hand and people started dying.
Ta rääkis, et neid palkas üks nende semu. Nad arvasid, et lähevad hobuseid varastama, aga kõik läks kontrolli alt välja ja inimesed hakkasid surema.
Lubosh came to me shortly after everything that happened. His conscience was gnawing at him.
Lubosh tuli mu juurde pärast kõike, mis juhtus. Südametunnistus vaevas teda.
I must say, I never expected it of him, but he turned out to be a better man than he seemed.
Pean tõdema, ei ootanud seda temalt, aga ta oli tegelikult parem mees, kui tundus olevat
I suppose it will have to do. I reckon I'll go and have a look round Ledetchko first. Thank you, Father. And don't worry, I won't tell anyone.
Arvan, et ka sellega saab hakkama. Ma usun, et esimesena lähen vaatan Ledetchkos ringi. Tänan sind, Isa. Ja ära muretse, ma ei räägi kellelegi.
Quarrelled? A corpse was found in the woods by Neuhof.
Tülitsesid? Üks laip oli leitud metsas Neuhofi juures.
Just nicknames, but maybe that will help. He mentioned some fellows called Reeky from Ledetchko, Pious and Timmy.
Ainult hüüdnimed, aga äkki needki aitavad. Ta mainis mingit Reeky nimelist selli Ledetchkost, Pioust ja Timmyt.
Hmm… That would explain something. Lubosh kept blabbering on that he wasn't a murderer, that he didn't want to do it…
Hmm... See seletaks midagi. Lubosh jätkas hämamist, et tema polnud mõrvar, et ta ei tahtnud seda korda saata...
So I know Lubosh killed one of the murderers and now he's dead too. Only I need to find the ones who are still alive. I need names and places. Did he mention any of the others?
Niisiis ma tean, et Lubosh tappis ühe mõrvari ja nüüd on ta ise ka surnud. Ma pean neid leidma, kes veel elus on. Ma vajan nimesid ja kohti. Kas ta mainis kedagi nendest?
I was wondering what he was up to, to take to the faith all of a sudden. But I suppose no sin's too dark for God's mercy.
Ma huvitusin sellest, mis tal plaanis oli, järsku usklikuks saamisel. Aga tundub, et ükski patt pole piisavalt tume, et Jumal halastaks.
He looked like he was in a hurry. It was only a shadow against the sky, but after what happened, I wouldn't wonder…
Tal tundus kiire olevat. See oli vaid vari vastu taevast, aga pärast seda, mis juhtus, ma ei imestaks...
The blessings of Our Lord be…
And with you, lad. Take a seat.
The blessings of Our Lord be with you.
I've come in the name of Sir Hanush of Leipa. I'm investigating the massacre in Neuhof and now a murder here as well. Can I ask you a few questions?
Ma tulin siia Leipa Söör Hanushi nimel. Ma uurin Neuhofi veresauna ja nüüd ka üht mõrva siin. Võin ma teile paar küsimust esitada?
Can you tell me anything about Lubosh?
Saad sa mulle midagi Luboshist rääkida?
I don't know how I can help you, but ask if you must.
Ei tea, kuidas sind aidata, aga küsi, kui pead.
Who was this Lubosh who was murdered?
Kes oli see Lubosh, keda tapeti?
Who was this Lubosh who was murdered?
Kes oli see Lubosh, keda tapeti?
Have you noticed anything suspicious recently?
Olete midagi kahtlast tähele pannud hiljuti?
Do you know what Lubosh was doing the day Neuhof was raided?
Kas te teate, mida Lubosh tegi päeval, kui Neuhoffi rünnati?
What was Lubosh doing the day of the Neuhof raid?
Mida tegi Lubosh Neuhofi rünnaku päeval?
Do you know who Lubosh used to spend time with? Kin or friends?
Kas te teate, kellega Lubosh aega veetis? Sugulased või sõbrad?
Those that live by the sword die by the sword. I'm not surprised the end he came to.
Need, kes elavad mõõgaga, surevad sellest. Ei üllata mind tema surm.
You could see at first glance he was no good. I kept well out of his way.
Esmapilgul võis näha, et temas polnud head. Ma hoidsin heaga temast eemale.
He was a drunkard and a beast. And lazy too. Idle hands are the Devil's tools.
Ta oli joomar ja metslane. Ja ka laisk. Tühjad käed on Pagana riistad.
Everything about him was suspicious! I always gave him a wide berth.
Kõik tema juures oli kahtlane! Ma alati hoidsin temast eemale.
There wasn't sight or sound of him for a long time, and then yesterday he turned up at the church and even talked to the parish priest. I never saw him do that before. Probably had a bad conscience.
Teda polnud ammu näha ega kuulda, ja siis eile ta tuli kirikusse ja isegi rääkis koguduse preestriga. Pole teda varem näinud seda tegemas. Arvatavasti oli südametunnistus must.
The only thing seemed suspicious was how a rogue like him suddenly started going to church. Now I see why, of course.
Ainuke asi, mis tundus kahtlane, oli see, et temataoline kelm järsku kirikusse läks. Nüüd näen ma ka muidugi miks.
I don't think he was home. I didn't see him all day.
Ei arva, et ta kodus oli. Pole teda terve päev näinud
What do I care about that scoundrel? I was glad he stayed out of my way.
Mis mind kaabaka juures ka huvitaks? Mul on hea meel, et ta minust eemale hoidis.
As far as I know, he had nobody at all in this world.
Nii palju, kui ma tean, polnud tal kedagi selles maailmas.
I don't know, since I don't go to alehouses.
Ma ei tea, sest mina kõrtsides ei käi.
He was always a loner, except lately he started talking to the parish priest of all people.
Ta oli alati üksik, aga hiljuti hakkas ta koguduse preestriga rääkima.
It doesn't matter where I'm from.
You think I'm too young for the job, Father?
Arvad, et ma olen liiga noor selleks ülesandeks, Isa?
So all at once the confessional seal isn't so sacred?
Niisiis pole pihisaladus järsku enam pühalik?
The confessional seal isn't sacred anymore?
Brothers and sisters. Let me get straight to the point. I'd like to talk about the Church and how corrupt it is.
Vennad ja õed. Lähme otse asja juurde. Ma tahaks rääkida Kirikust ja selle korruptiivsusest.
Greetings, brothers and sisters in Christ. I am here to tell you about Mother Church and to show you through my words how she is falling into decay and abandon.
Tervitused, Kristuse vennad ja õed. Ma olen siin, et rääkida Püha Ema Kirikust ja püüan teile läbi sõnade selgeks teha, kuidas see laguneb.
So are we doing this or not?
Why? The Deutsch is in the tavern.
Wait. We have to check that the coast is clear.
Oota. Me peame vaatama, et kedagi poleks.
But maybe you noticed after all these years that he has a wife and a son…
Aga äkki sa oled nende kõigi aastatega avastanud, et tal on veel naine ja poeg...
Yes! Matthias, go and lure her away somehow.
Jah! Mattias, mine ja meelita ta kuidagi eemale.
For shame! I've never seen him so drunk!
Häbi talle! Pole kunagi teda vindisena näinud!
In the house of God! Has he no shame?
No good Christian would act like that! And a priest should be more than a good Christian!
Ükski hea Kristlane ei käituks nii! Ja preester peab olema parem kui hea Kristlane!
He's a vulgar drunken pig! They should lock him away in the monastery.
Ta on labane purjus siga! Nad peaksid teda kloostri lukustama!
Surely it's a sin even to listen to such a beast preaching!
Sellise metsiku sea jutlust kuulata on omaette patt!
He's always practised what he preaches, but this is going too far!
Ta alati harjutab oma jutlust, aga see on juba liig!
We should complain to the bishop about him. It's long past time we had a real pastor here!
Me peaksime piiskopile kaebama. Meil pole juba ammu õiget pastorit olnud!
Come on then! What's the hold-up? We've no time to waste!
Tule nüüd! Mis sa muned? Me ei saa aega raisata!
Come on, Henry! Don't tell me you've changed your mind!
Tule nüüd, Henri! Ära ütle, et muutsid meelt!
What's the matter with you? We have to start mass! It's already late!
Mis lahti on? Me peame teenistusega alustama! Juba on hilja!
Alright then, suit yourself! But don't expect any help from me!
Hea küll, tee, mis tahad! Aga ära looda minult abi saada!
Taking back what's rightfully yours isn't stealing.
Millegi võtmine, mis kuulub sulle, ei ole varastamine.
I'm only taking back what you stole. What are you going to do about it?
Ma võtan ainult tagasi seda, mida sa varastasid. Mida sa selle kohta kostad?
And who do you think will end up in the stocks? Me or the man who took goods from the blacksmith without paying?
Ja kes meist lõpetab türmis? Mina või mees, kes võttis meie sepikojast kaupa selle eest maksmata?
I'll call a catchpole on you!
As you like, you pup. We'll handle it without a catchpole.
Kuidas sa soovid, kutsikas. Saame hakkama ilma maksukogujata.
A locked chest. I'll need a lockpick to get into that. Fritz might have one.
Suletud kirst. Mul on vaja muukrauda, et see lahti saada. Fritsul võib mõni leiduda.
If you say so. It's no skin off my nose anyway. I've got some lockpicks you can have. But if you get caught, you didn't get them from me!
Kui sa nii ütled. Mind see ei puuduta. Mul on mõned muukrauad, mis võin sinule anda, kuid vahele jäädes ei saanud sa neid minult.
Listen, there's this locked chest I need to get into.
Kuulge, on üks lukustatud kirst, mille ma pean avama.
No, nothing like that. It's just that someone has something that doesn't belong to him and I want to take it back.
Ei, mitte midagi sellist. Lihtsalt, kellelgi on midagi, mis talle ei kuulu ning ma tahaksin selle tagasi saada.
Never heard of you. Thank, Fritz.
Ma pole sinust kunagi midagi kuulnud. Aitäh, Frits.
Really? An honest trade not good enough for you any more?
Tõesti? Aus kaup pole enam sinu jaoks hea?
I need to unlock a chest.
I'm looking for a fellow who lives here, but I don't know his name. Do you know anyone with a limp?
Ma otsin mehikest, kes elab siin, aga ei tea tema nime. Kas sa tunned kedagi, kes lonkab?
Must be that farmhand Lubosh. I don't know what the hell you'd want him for, and I don't much care. He's got a cottage on the edge of the village near the stream.
Peab olema too põllumees Lubosh. Ma ei tea, mida põrgut sa temalt tahad, ja mind mind ei huvita. Tal on maja küla ääres oja lähedal.
Aye, there is one fellow with a limp. Can't imagine what you'd want with the likes of him, but that's your affair. He lives in a cottage on the edge of the village by the road to Neuhof.
Oojaa, on üks lonkav mehike. Ei kujuta ette, mida sa temasuguselt tahad, aga see on sinu asi. Ta elab majakeses küla ääres teel Neuhoffi.
What would you want with him? Well, it's no skin off my nose. The bastard has a cottage on the edge of the village by the road to Rattay.
Mida sa tema juures tahaksid? Hästi, pole minu asi. Värdjal on majake küla ääres teel Rattajesse.
I'm looking for a fellow who lives here, but I don't know his name. Do you know anyone with a limp?
Ma otsin mehikest, kes elab siin, aga ei tea tema nime. Kas sa tunned kedagi, kes lonkab?
There is one, a crooked bastard he is too. I hope you're here to take him away. He lives in a cottage at the end of the village by the road to Rattay.
On üks, küürus värdjas on ta ka. Ma loodan et sa tulid tema järgi. Ta elab majakeses küla lõpus teel Rattajasse.
That'll be Lubosh - gallows bait if I ever saw one! His place is at the end of the village next to the stream. Take him and welcome!
Selleks on Lubosh - Lööks maha, kui näeks! Tema koht on küla lõpus oja kõrval. Võta teda ja tervita!
Aye, he lives here alright, the Devil take him! In a cottage at the end of the village by the road to Neuhof.
Oojaa, ta elabki siin, kurat võtaks! Majakeses küla lõpus teel Neuhoffi.
So, let's see what you're made of. Hold it properly! And keep moving, never stand still when your life depends on it!
Nii, vaatame millest sa tehtud oled. Hoia seda korralikult! Ja jätka liikumist, ära seisa kunagi paigal, kui su elu sellest oleneb!
You've got to put your back into a good slash. No use waving the sword around like you're swatting flies. Go into the attack with your whole body!
Sa pead oma selja heasse lööki panema. Kasutu on vehkida mõõgaga nagu tapaks kärbseid. Mine rünnakusse terve oma kehaga!
Try slashing from various sides to get used to it.
Proovi lüüa erinevatelt külgedelt, et sa harjuks sellega ära.
That pointy tip isn't for decoration! Try stabbing me with it a few times!
See terav ots pole kaunistus! Proovi mind torgata paar korda!
That will do. Slashing, stabbing and movement are the foundations that you build everything else on.
Sellest piisab. Löömine, torkamine ja liikuvus on vundament, millele sa saad ülejäänu ehitada.
String your strikes together. As soon as you finish one, begin another. Strike, strike, strike!
Liida oma rünnakud ühte. Kohe, kui sa lõpetad ühe, alusta järgmist. Ründa, ründa, ründa!
Now let's try something more complicated. One strike I can simply fend off - you mustn't give your opponent time to react.
Nüüd proovime midagi keerulisemat. Ühest rünnakust suudan ma eemale hoida - sa ei tohi anda oma vastasele aega reageerida.
Try not to exhaust yourself. Pay attention, and when your strength is failing, pull back for a while.
Proovi ennast mitte väsitada. Pane tähele, ja kui su jõud raugeb, tõmba natukeseks tagasi.

See how breathless you are! This is really important - if you rush heedlessly into the attack, your opponent will just deflect your blows, and when you can't keep it up any longer, he'll take you down with one blow.
Vaata, kuidas sa hingeldad! See on väga tähtis - kui sa kiirustad mõtlematult rünnakule, su vastane lihtsalt väldib su hoope, ja kui sa ei suuda enam vastu pidada, võtab ta su ühe hoobiga maha.
Now let's see how you do with defence. It's not hard to block a basic strike - just watch out and move your sword into the path of the blow.
Nüüd vaatame, kuidas sul läheb kaitsemisega. Pole raske kaitsta tavalist lööki - lihtsalt vaata ette ja liiguta oma mõõk vastase hoobi ette.
That'll do. Once again, notice how blocking gradually exhausts you. Parrying can save your arse for a while, but it'll never win you the fight.
Sellest piisab. Veel kord, pane tähele, kuidas kaitsemine tasapisi sind väsitab. Kõrvale põiklemine vüib su perse mõneks ajaks päästa, kuid sellega ei võida sa kunagi võitlust.
In the end your opponent will tire you out and hit you. But we'll look at that in a while. Now you have the basics, so we'll put them to the test.
Lõpuks väsitab vastane su ära ja virutab sulle. Aga selleni me veel jõuame. Nüüd, kus sul on põhitõed, paneme me su proovile.
We'll fight for a while. Try out everything you've learned.
Me võitleme mõnda aega. Proovi kõike, mis sa oled õppinud.
Very well then, let's see what you're made of, lad. Come at me and don’t hold back.
Hästi siis, vaatame, millest sa tehtud oled, noormees. Tule ja ära hoia end tagasi
Fine, that's enough. I have my work cut out, it seems … but that's life.
Hästi, see on kõik. Mu töö katkestati, mulle tundub ... kuid see on elu.
Fine, enough! You're not a complete dead loss. It will be hard work to turn you into a master, but you have the basics.
Hästi, kõik! Sa pole täiesti lootusetu. Saab olema raske töö, sinust isanda tegemine, kuid sul on põhitõed.
Right, lesson two. Everything you've learned about blocking is wrong!
Nii, õppetund kaks. Kõik, mis sa blokeerimise kohta oled õppinud, on vale.
But it's better not to control just the space, but actually your opponent's weapon. Attack and I'll show you.
Kuid see pole hea ainult ruumi kontrollimiseks, vaid ka vastase mõõga. Ründa mind ja ma näitan sulle.
When I cover, I can simply fend off your blows with my sword and gain control of the space between us.
Kui ma kaitsen, saan ma su löögid oma mõõgaga lihtsalt ära blokeerida ja saan kontrolli meie vahel oleva ruumi üle.
Alright, that will do. Now you. The trick is to stay in your stance. As soon as I start to attack, you block. The move knocks the blade aside.
Korras, sellest piisab. Nüüd sina. Trikk on seista oma löögiasendis. Kohe, kui ma ründan, sa blokeerid. Liigutus lööb tera kõrvale.
Right, now we'll try it a little faster. Concentrate and block just at the moment I start attacking. I'll strike from above each time, so you can see it well.
Hästi, nüüd proovime seda natuke kiiremini. Keskendu ja blokeeri samal momendil, kui ma alustan ründamist. Ma löön iga kord ülevalt, niiet sa ka näed seda.
Good, good. Now let's try it at full speed. You probably won't succeed, but that's normal at the start. You must train! Let's go!
Hästi, hästi. Nüüd proovime seda täiskiirusel. Sul arvatavasti ei õnnestu, kuid see on alguses normaalne. Sa pead treenima! Lähme!
Let's try it. You strike a few times at the side where I'm not holding my sword.
Proovime seda. Sa lööd mõned korrad küljele, kus ma mõõka ei hoia.
Let's try something more advanced. When in combat, keep an eye on the space between you and your opponent. That is your space.
Proovime midagi keerulisemat. Kui oled võitluses, hoia silm sinu ja vastase vahelisel ruumil. See on sinu ala.
Try to attack from the side the opponent will find harder to block in time. If I'm holding the sword raised up, do an uppercut. If my sword is low, lunge.
Proovi rünnata küljelt, kust vastasel on kõige raskem õigel ajal blokeerida. Kui ma hoian mõõka üleval, tee haaklöök. Kui mu mõõk on madalal, torka.
A fine state you're in this morning! What on earth did you get up to last night?
Päris "korralikus" seisus oled täna hommikul! Millega sa eile siin maamunal hakkama said?
Well, I hope he didn't fill your head with nonsense!
Olgu, ma loodan, et ta ei ajanud sulle kärbseid pähe!
Nothing much. Me and the lads were just having a chat in the tavern. Some wayfarer stopped by. He was telling us what's going on in the world and… well, I lost track of time.
Millegi erilisega. Mina ja poisid ajasime lihtsalt kõrtsis juttu. Üks rändur astus sisse ning ta rääkis meile, mis maailmas toimub ja... noh, ma kaotasin ajataju.
We were chatting in the tavern (Speech).
Ah, that's why you're tired… But you'll still have to work today!
Ahsoo, sellepärast oledki väsinud... Kuid sa pead sellest hoolimata täna tööd tegema!
I was with Bianca. We were… talking.
Ma olin Biankaga. Me... ajasime juttu.
Talking, were you? That's what you call it, is it?
Ajasite juttu? Sellisena sa siis seda nimetadki?
I was sweating in the forge all day yesterday and then I was helping Fritz and Matthew with some errands. So I'd say I have a right to be a bit tired.
Ma higistasin kogu eilse päeva sepikojas ning seejärel aitasin Fritsu ja Mattiast paari tööotsaga. Nii et ma usun, et mul on õigus olla tsipa väsinud.
I was working in the forge (Strength).
Well, I've got a feeling there's something you're not telling me. And it's connected with that scratch on your hand and that suspicious-looking character with a sword who turned up in town recently.
Ohjah, mul on tunne, et sa ei räägi mulle midagi. Midagi, mis oleks seotud selle kriimustusega su käe peal ning selle kahtlase välimusega tegelasega mõõgaga, kes saabus hiljuti linna.
Alright then, if you say so. I don't mean to pry, but you know your father takes a dim view of such things.
Olgu, kui sa nii ütled. Ma ei topi enda nina sinu asjadesse, kuid sa tead, et su isa ei suhtu nendesse asjadesse hästi.
You think he's teaching me swordfighting, don't you? What use would that be to me? Here? I'm not lying to you, Ma.
Sa arvad, et ta õpetab mulle mõõgavõitlust, kas pole nii? Mis kasu minul sellest oleks? Siin? Ma ei valeta sulle ema.
Why would I be interested in swordfighting? (Speech).
Miks ma peaksin olema huvitatud mõõgavõitlusest? (Kõnevõime)
So I'm learning to swordfight, and what of it? What harm does it do? At least I'll be able to defend myself!
Noh ma õpingi mõõgavõitlust ja mis sellest? Mis kurja see teeb? Vähemalt ma olen suuteline ennast kaitsma!
How? What's he going to do? I'm doing nothing wrong - I just wanted to try it!
Kuidas? Mida ta teeb? Ma ei tee midagi valesti - ma tahtsin lihtsalt proovida!
On your own head be it then! I can't stop you, and you can deal with your father on your own. Don't come looking to me for help!
See jääb sinu vastutuseks! Mina sind peatada ei saa ning sa saad enda isaga hakkama ka üksi. Ära tulle mind appi paluma!
God above, Hal! You know how your father will react when he finds out!
Taevane jumal, poiss! Sa tead, kuidas su isa reageerib, kui ta sellest teada saab!
Thanks, Ma, but I'm not four years old.
Aitäh, Emm, kuid ma ei ole neljaaastane.
I know, Hal. You've grown up in front of my eyes. It's hard to get used to it.
Ma tean, poiss. Sa oled mu silmi ees üles kasvanud. Raske on sellega harjuda.
I was with Bianca! Do you want a blow-by-blow account of everything we did? What's this, an interrogation?!
Ma olin Biankaga! Kas sa tahad järk-järgult teade kõike, mida me tegime? Kas see on mingi ülekuulamine?!
Alright, alright… Sorry, son, it's just that I worry about you.
Olgu,olgu... Vabanda, poeg, ma lihtsalt muretsen sinu pärast.
Oh, come on! I've no interest in poaching. It's just a bit of fun.
Oh, jäta nüüd. Mul ei ole huvi salaküttimises. See on lihtsalt natuke lõbus.
No… It's just… Matthias was teaching me archery.
Ei... Lihtsalt... Mattias õpetas mulle vibulaskmist.
Archery? Do you want to become a poacher? Have you any idea of the punishment for that?! And where did you get a bow anyway?
Vibulaskmist? Kas sa tahad saada salakütiks? Kas sul on aimu, millised karistused selle eest on?! Ja pealegi kust sa vibu said?
Christ give me strength! Just don't do anything stupid, for the love of God! Promise?
Kristus andku mulle jõudu! Lihtsalt jumala eest, ära tee midagi lolli! Lubad?
What would you like, ale or wine?
Mida sa soovid, õlu või veini?
The blessings of Our Lord Jesus…
I wouldn't have expected that from a man of the cloth!
Ma poleks seda vaimulikult mehelt ootanud!
How kind of you not to come and disturb my solitude.
Nii lahke sinust, et sa mu üksindust ei häiri.
Sorry, I just didn't want to go drinking with you.
Vabandan, ma lihtsalt ei tahtnud sinuga jooma minna.
I didn't want to drink with you.
Trust me, there's nowhere I'd rather have been. You wouldn't believe what happened to me…
Usu mind, ma ei sooviks mujal olla. Sa ei usu, mis minuga juhtunud on...
Trust me, there's nowhere I'd rather have been.
Usu mind, ma ei sooviks mujal olla.
Hmm… hmmm. Well, the feeling is mutual, as it happens. I've nothing to say to you anyway.
Hmm... Hmmmm. Hästi, tunne on ühine, nagu tavaliselt. Mul pole nii kui nii midagi sulle öelda.
Haha! Tell me all about it this evening then!
Haha! Räägi mulle siis kõik sel õhtul!
You've got that right - I wouldn't!
You think because I'm a man of the cloth I won't kick your arse?!
Arvad, et olles vaimulik ei anna ma sulle kere peale?!
Bastard! You'll get your penance now!
It's a sin to fight so badly!
Er... yes, of course I like you.
So why are you surprised Godwin likes me too?
Miks sa siis üllatunud oled, et ma Godwinile meeldin?
I'm not! I mean, I see... I think...
Ma pole! Ma mõtlen, ma näen... ma arvan...
Yes. What's the matter, don't you like me?
Jah. Mis mureks, ma ei meeldi sulle?
You want to kill me? You won't find out anything that way.
Tahad mind tappa? Sel viisil ei saa sa midagi teada.
Put away that weapon, son, and come and settle it man to man, hand to hand.
Pane relv eemale, poeg, ja lahendame seda mees mehe vastu, rusikavõitluses.
See? I didn't go against your sword. I went with it and fended it aside.
Näed? Ma ei läinud su mõõga vastu. Ma läksin sellega kaasa ja lükkasin kõrvale.
That way I opened your cover and could strike.
Seda tehes avasin ma su katte ja sain rünnata.
See? I'm leading you as if I had you roped. Once more.
Näed? Ma juhin sind nagu sa oleks köitega kinni. Veel kord.
It has to be perfectly timed, damn it! It won't always come off.
See peab olema perfektselt ajastatud, pagan võtaks! See ei tule alati välja.
Strike from any side you like.
Where did we finish? Yeah, leading the opponent where you want him.
Kuhu me jäimegi? Jah, vastase juhatamine sinna, kuhu sa tahad.
There's one more way to evade a strike. You simply step aside.
On veel üks löögi vältimise viis. Sa lihtsalt astud kõrvale.
It'll throw the opponent off a bit and there's your chance!
See viib vastase natuke rütmist välja ja siis on sinu võimalus!
I'll attack slowly now. As soon as you see me raise the weapon, jump aside.
Ma ründan nüüd aeglaselt. Kohe, kui näed mind mõõka tõstmas, hüppa kõrvale.
Alright, try it. It's important not to move too soon - I'll see where you're going and hit you. And the same will happen if you move too late.
Hästi, proovi. Tähtis on mitte liiga vara liikuda - ma näeks, kuhu sa lähed ja saaks sulle pihta. Sama juhtub siis, kui sa liigud liiga hilja.
Right. There's one more way to evade a blow. Attack!
Nii. On veel üks võimalus hoobi vältimiseks. Ründa!
Never take your eyes off your opponent. You'll see his strike before it's even properly started.
Ära kunagi lase oma vastast silmist. Sa näed ta rünnakut isegi enne, kui see on õigesti alanud.
Fine, now try it a little quicker. Try and get used to the rhythm.
Hästi, proovi nüüd natuke kiiremini. Proovi ja harju rütmiga ära.
And the last thing for today - a trick.
Try it. Draw back the weapon, then change the attack zone and strike. So I don't have time to react.
Proovi seda. Tõmba oma relv tagasi, siis muuda rünnakuala ja löö. Nii pole mul aega reageerida.
You raise the sword to force your opponent to block, but then change the direction of the attack at the last moment and the opponent won't even know what hit him!
Sa tõstad mõõga, et su vastane hakkaks blokeerima, kuid siis muudad viimasel momendil löögi suunda ja vastane ei saa isegi aru, mis teda tabas!
Good. You won't trick an old hand with that, but if you learn to feint really well, you can easily take down an unprepared opponent with one blow.
Hästi. Sa ei üllata sellega kogenenud kätt, kuid kui õpid väga hästi petet tegema, saad kerge vaevaga ettevalmistamata vastase ühe hoobiga maha võtta.
And your old man can fuck off too!
Ning su vanamees võib samuti perse käia!
You had it coming, you pup!

One beating wasn't enough for you!?

All right, you fucker, you won! Proud of yourself?
Olgu peale, pede, sa võitsid! Rahul endaga?
Just take what you want, you swine.
Lihstalt võta, mida sa tahad, siga.

Hmm… Let's see then. Take this bow, go and stand in position over there and we can start.
Hmm... Vaatame siis. Võta see vibu, mine ja seisa sinna positsioonile ja me võime alustada.

Ja veel üks asi, pane see käekaitse peale. Ilma selleta võid oma vibunööriga küünarvarrele haiget teha, nii et kindlasti kanna seda!

Jäta oma tänud ja mine positsioonile.
And maybe I can teach you something more.
Ja võibolla saan ma sulle veel midagi õpetada.

Alright, you're not completely useless, but turning you into a proper combatant will take a lot of training and practice.
Olgu, sa pole täiesti kasutu, kuid sinust tõelise võitleja tegemine vajab palju treeningut ja harjutamist.
But don't get cocky! You have to train hard and persistently. You might have talent, but talent alone won't do. Practice!

I can teach you something more when you're up to it.
Ma võin sulle midagi veel õpetada, kui sul tahtmist on.
Whenever you've nothing better to do and you're in the mood for it, you can come and train here with me.
Kui sul pole paremat teha ja sul on selleks tuju, võid sa tulla ja treenida siin minuga.
Well now, that wasn't too bad! Maybe we'll make a soldier of you after all.
Hea küll, see polnud üldse paha! Võib-olla teeme sinust ikkagi sõdalase.
Don't just stand there like a pillar of salt! Keep moving! Don't stop, or you'll be an easy target!

Remember this well - in combat, never stand too long on one spot.
Jäta see hästi meelde - võitluses, ära kunagi seisa ühe koha peal.
Faster! As soon as you blow hits home or is blocked, strike again straight away!
Kiiremini! Kohe, kui saad mõne hoobi pihta või see blokeeritakse, löö kohe uuesti!
Too slow! One strike after another!

Even faster! Hit, hit, hit! Don't slacken the pace!

Don't hop around like a startled rabbit! We have to train!

Now concentrate. A bow ain't exactly the weapon of choice of a knight, but it can come in very handy.

Pole vahet, kui hea sa oled, su vastane väsitab su lõpuks ära.
